text: Aur jiss ney apnay maa baap say kaha kay tum say mein tang aagaya tum mujh say yehi kehtay raho gay kay mein marney kay baad phir zindah kiya jaoon ga mujh say pehlay bhi ummaten guzar chuki hain woh dono janab bari mein faryad kertay hain aur kehtay hain tujhay kharabi ho tu eman ley aa be-shak Allah ka wada haq hai woh jawab deta hai kay yeh to sirf aglon kay afsaney hain
